subject: Pro Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: The rookie left tackle Matt Kalil of the Minnesota Vikings was added to the N.F.C.’s Pro Bowl roster to replace the Washington Redskins’ Trent Williams, who is injured.
snippet: The rookie left tackle Matt Kalil of the Minnesota Vikings was added to the N.F.C.’s Pro Bowl roster to replace the Washington Redskins’ Trent Williams, who is injured.
